description: Number of rooted identity matched trees with n nodes.
comments: Also number of rooted identity trees with n nodes and 2-colored non-root nodes. - _Christian G. Bower_, Apr 15 1998
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 429
R. Simion, Trees with 1-factors and oriented trees, Discrete Math., 88 (1991), 93-104.
Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
Index entries for sequences related to trees
maple: b:= proc(n, i) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(i<1, 0,      add(binomial(2*a(i), j)*b(n-i*j, i-1), j=0..n/i)))    end:a:= n-> `if`(n=1, 1, b((n-1)$2)):seq(a(n), n=1..40);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 01 2013
mathematica: b[n_, i_] := b[n, i] = If[n == 0, 1, If[i<1, 0, Sum[Binomial[2*a[i], j]*b[n-i*j, i-1], {j, 0, n/i}]]]; a[n_] := If[n == 1, 1, b[n-1, n-1]]; Table[a[n] // FullSimplify, {n, 1, 30}] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Mar 17 2014, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
